title: Trusted Retrieval 101
shard_text: Retrieval-augmented generation (RAG) answers questions using external documents Attribution means listing which source spans back each claim.

title: Trusted Retrieval 101
shard_text: Faithfulness requires that claims are supported by cited sources.

title: Merkle Hashes in Plain English
shard_text: A Merkle tree links many hashes into a single root This makes tampering detectable.

title: Merkle Hashes in Plain English
shard_text: If any shard changes, the root changes.

title: Trusted Execution Environments
shard_text: A TEE can attest to the code and environment used to run an evaluation.

title: Trusted Execution Environments
shard_text: Attestation helps others trust the results were produced as claimed.
